title: Session details information - reporting
description: Session details information that is processed and reported by Media Analytics solution.

xdm:isFederated.title: Federated Data
xdm:isFederated.description: Set to true when the hit is federated (i.e., received by the customer as part of a federated data share, rather than their own implementation).

xdm:isViewed.title: Media Starts
xdm:isViewed.description: Load event for the media. (This occurs when the viewer clicks the Play button). This would count even if there are pre-roll ads, buffering, errors, and so on.

xdm:isPlayed.title: Content Starts
xdm:isPlayed.description: First frame of media is consumed. If the user drops during ad, buffering, etc., then there would be no “Content Start” event.

xdm:isCompleted.title: Content Completes
xdm:isCompleted.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion, this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Content Time Spent
xdm:timePlayed.description: Sums the event duration (in seconds) for all events of type PLAY on the main content.

xdm:totalTimePlayed.title: Media Time Spent
xdm:totalTimePlayed.description: Describes the total amount of time spent by a user on a specific timed media asset, which includes time spent watching ads.

xdm:uniqueTimePlayed.title: Unique Time Played
xdm:uniqueTimePlayed.description: Describes the sum of the unique intervals seen by a user on a timed media asset - i.e. the length playback intervals viewed multiple times are only counted once.

xdm:averageMinuteAudience.title: Average Minute Audience
xdm:averageMinuteAudience.description: Describes the average content time spent for a specific media item - i.e. the total content time spent divided by the length for all of the playback sessions.

xdm:adCount.title: Ad Count
xdm:adCount.description: The number of ads started during the playback.

xdm:chapterCount.title: Chapter Count
xdm:chapterCount.description: The number of chapters started during the playback.

xdm:hasProgress10.title: 10% Progress Marker
xdm:hasProgress10.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 10% marker of media based on stream length. The marker is only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:hasProgress25.title: 25% Progress Marker
xdm:hasProgress25.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 25% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:hasProgress50.title: 50% Progress Marker
xdm:hasProgress50.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 50% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:hasProgress75.title: 75% Progress Marker
xdm:hasProgress75.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 75% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:hasProgress95.title: 95% Progress Marker
xdm:hasProgress95.description: Indicates that the playhead passed the 95% marker of media based on stream length. Marker only counted once, even if seeking backwards. If seeking forward, markers that are skipped are not counted.

xdm:estimatedStreams.title: Estimated Streams
xdm:estimatedStreams.description: The estimated number of video or audio streams per each individual content.

xdm:hasPauseImpactedStreams.title: Pause Impacted Streams
xdm:hasPauseImpactedStreams.description: Indicates if one or more pauses occurred during the playback of a single media item.

xdm:pauseCount.title: Pause Events
xdm:pauseCount.description: The number of pause periods that occurred during playback.

xdm:pauseTime.title: Total Pause Duration
xdm:pauseTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which playback was paused by the user.

xdm:segment.title: Video Segment
xdm:segment.description: The interval that describes the part of the content that has been viewed in minutes.

xdm:hasSegmentView.title: Media Segment Views
xdm:hasSegmentView.description: Indicates when at least one frame, not necessarily the first has been viewed.

xdm:secondsSinceLastCall.title: Media Session Server Timeout
xdm:secondsSinceLastCall.description: Indicates the amount of time, in seconds, that passed between the user's last known interaction and the moment the session was closed.

xdm:pev3.title: Pev3
xdm:pev3.description: The type of the media stream used for reporting.
